    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    BarChart
     
    BarChartToolTipTextOptions
     
    BarChartToolTipTokenValuesProvider
     
    BarChartValue
    A bar chart value has 2 values: 1 for the x-axis, and 1 for the y-axis of the bar chart.
    BarChartValueMapper
     
    BarToolTipText
    Represents the tool tip text when hovering over a bar in a bar chart.
    BarToolTipText.TokenWithValue
     
    ChartValue
     
    GraphicalInterface
    Represents a graphical interface through which the user can input starting investment parameters and display their growth over time in a bar chart.
    InvestmentAccount
    Represents an investment account with a balance which changes in response to growth from annual returns, deposits, withdrawals, and fees.
    InvestmentSimulator
    Simulates the growth of an investment over time, with yearly contributions, growth rate, and inflation adjustments.
    ProjectedBalance
    Represents the balance of an investment in a given year.
    SimulationState
    Represents the state of the investment simulator.
